text: The art which we may call generally art of the wayside, as opposed to that which is the business of men's lives, is, in the best sense of the word, Grotesque.
author: John Ruskin

text: The best defense against usurpatory government is an assertive citizenry.
author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

text: As a mom, I know it is my responsibility, and no one else's, to raise my kids. But we have to ask ourselves, what does it mean when so many parents are finding their best efforts undermined by an avalanche of advertisements aimed at our kids.
author: Michelle Obama

text: We do not look in our great cities for our best morality.
author: Jane Austen

text: A man's best fortune, or his worst, is his wife.
author: Thomas Fuller
